name: Drawn to the Flame
description:
Drawn to the Flame is a short horror point & click adventure, based on a recurring nightmare about elevators that I've had since I was a kid. It's more of an experiment in atmosphere and mood, or an interactive surreal nightmare if you will, so please don't expect any complex puzzles or dialog trees. 

This is also the first game I've completed solely on my own, and as much as that shows, I'm happy with how it ended up.

For those wondering, yes the name is an homage to Fantasy Flight's card game, Arkham Horror.

HOW TO PLAY:
Left click to interact with something/someone
Right click to look at something/someone
F5 to save your game
F7 to load a previously saved game
F9 to restart the game
Ctrl & Q to quit the game
Alt & X to immediately exit the game
